"If you were doing that, why didn't you invite me?" Rikishi said. "I have a second home here in this city, we can all torture him together."

"Sir, that would be an honor to do that." Kimo said as all seven sumos went to Rikishi's house. Did anyone tried to stop them on the way there?
15231221111112.title: A special sumo!

1523122111112.content:
"If that were the case, we would be torturing him right now!" Ozeki said as he punched Kimo in the stomach. After that, all hell broke loose as Booma stopped stinkfacing you to help his friends out. "I knew that you would turn on us." Booma said as he kicked Zuna in his chest. "Rolling Thunderball!" Kimo said as he bowled Ozeki over. "Sumo Squeeze!" Mamoo said as he super bear hugged Gonzo. Due to Gonzo sweating however, he got out Mamoo's Sumo Squeeze with relative ease and started a rebound attack.

"Gluteus Maximus!" Booma said as he was about to buttslam Zuna. Meanwhile, you were getting up and about to leave the ring as Zuna dodged the Gluteus Maximus and Booma's massive ass hit your entire body. Booma got up and tried again as you were unconscious due to the blow. The six sumos' fight was furious; bodies were flying, asses were connecting to people's faces and all sorts of stuff. Which sumo team won?
1523122111112.title: They didn't (Sumo Showdown)

15231221111121.content:
The Super Duper Sumos got an upper hand when they sumo sized. They became bigger than the Evil Sumos and put them in a pile. "Let finish this!" Kimo said. "Gluteus Maximus!" The team said as they slammed their butts on the evil sumos, making them the winner. After that, they set up a sumo for each corner. "This is going to be fun! Mamoo said. The sumos took off their thongs and planted their gigantic, sweaty butts on their faces; Kimo's ass was on Ozeki's face, Mamoo's ass was on Gonzo's face and Booma's ass was on Zuna's face.

Two seconds after this triple stinkface started, The Super Duper Sumos started to fart on the Evil Sumos' faces. This is what woke you up. "What is that smell?" You said quietly to yourself as you were in the unoccupied corner of the ring. You opened your eyes and saw that the Evil sumos were getting farted on by the Super Duper Sumos. Booma was the first person to notice that you were watching this.

"Look you guys, our prize is awoke!" Booma said as he released another massive fart on Zuna's face. The other two sumos saw this and laughed while releasing more farts on their opponents faces. The sumos' stomachs started to gurgle loudly. "Ready to show the kid a preview of what he'll be dealing with?" Booma asked his brothers. "Yes!" Kimo and Mamoo said. The three sumos grunted hard and pooped on the Evil sumos's faces. You couldn't believe your eyes as you saw the shit drip down to the floor on each corner. The Super Duper Sumos stopped this after 3 minutes and got out of their corners. You couldn't see any of the Evil sumos' faces, just a huge pile of shit on top of it. After wiping themselves with their opponents faces, they put their thongs back on and grabbed you. "Let's go!" Mamoo said as you struggled from his grip. You couldn't get away as they took you to their HQ as the sun was slowly rising. They went to the basement where they had themselves a ring of their own. Mamoo threw you in and the three of them got in the ring as well. "If you thought the torture you endured before was bad, just you wait!" Booma said as the three of them came closer to you.
15231221111121.title: The Super Duper Sumos

15231221111122.content:
The Evil Sumos somehow pulled a win from the Super Duper Sumos as they used there bad tactics to win. After knocking them unconscious, The Evil Sumos threw the others in a garbage bin and locked them in it. That was when you woke up. "What's going on?" You said. "Look, are prize is waking up!" Ozeki said as he grabbed you. "Let's take him to Bad Inc." Gonzo said as they went over there with you in tow. "Hey BH, we beaten the sumos!" Zuna said. "What proof do you have?" BH asked. "We threw them in the dumpster." Ozeki said.

"That's great news! Ms. Mister will be proud when I tell her the news!" BH said. "Does that mean that I get to leave? You asked. "No!" BH yelled. "Evil sumos, for your efforts, you can do what you want with the skinny one." BH said as the Evil sumos were happy. They took you to there Dungeon Gym, which had old thongs across the floor. The were ready to torture you.
15231221111122.title: The Evil Sumos

15231221112.content: The sumos started to fight the evil sumos. As you were watching these six sumos fight, you think to yourself that this is the perfect chance to get away... But you're caught...
15231221112.title: They start fighing the evil sumos

15232.content:
"Evil sumos, come here!" Ms. Mister said as they came forth.

These 3 evil sumos were created to defeat the Super Duper Sumos in the lab of Bad Inc. They almost one until the heroic trio switched who they fought and won.
Now they punish new recruits for failing. For how long though is up to them. These 2 evil sumos don't have an official name so I (The Writer) will give them names myself.

He of the Extra Arms will be called Zuna. He is the counterpart of Mamoo, who has two extra arms and wears a green thong.

He of the Big Iron Chest will be called Gonzo. He is the counterpart of Kimo. His left arm and a part of his chest is made of an indestructible metal and wears a white thong. He is the tallest of the trio.

He of the Third Butt Cheek will be called Ozeki. He is the counterpart of Booma. He is bald and had a third butt cheek, but gotten it removed because of surgery, also he wears a dark orange thong. He is the fattest of the trio. If you thought that Booma was tough, wait until they torture you!

"You called us oh wise one?" Zuna asked. "Yes I did. This one failed his mission, again. Take him to your area and punish him as long as you want to make sure he gets it right next time!" Ms. Mister yelled. "You got it boss!" Gonzo said as he grabbed you with his left hand. You try to escape Gonzo's grasp, but his hand is too strong. "No! I'll be better next time!" You beg as you were being dragged by Gonzo and the others as the closed and locked the door, sealing you in with these bad sumos.
15232.title: The Evil Sumos!

152321.content:
Massive Gonzo lifted your puny body up and held you at his side like a sack of flour. Your legs kicked toward the front of him and your head was behind him. You tried to get their attention and beg them to let you go, but it was just met by evil snickering and even tighter squeezing. You were utterly trapped and helpless. His indestructible metal arm was pressing hard against your back and your chest was hugged tightly to his miserably cold and solid side of his metallic chest. Gonzo was so tall that you dangled way above the ground and your eyes are stuck staring at the side of his gargantuan ass. The thin white material of his thong wasn't doing a good enough job at keeping his gigantic ass enclosed. The material was dripping with sweat and had stains on it. You didn't even want to imagine what could have made half the stains on that thong.

Your evil tormentor must never shower. His sweaty partially exposed ass cheek rubs against your nose every now and then. Also, there is a wafting smell of stink-ass. The smell is nauseating and you aren’t even super close to it yet. In a deep and menacing voice, Gonzo tells you, “We are going to have fun punishing you. Nearly to our wrestling lair. I doubt you will even make it after what we plan on putting you through - mwahahaha.”

It was getting warmer by the second. The air started thickening with moisture and funk – it was hot and humid and starting to smell like a locker room that was never cleaned. A loud door slammed. You noticed that they had locked you into a dimly lit, windowless room with them. The only thing in the room was a huge wrestling ring. When Gonzo got to the outside of the ring, he easily lifted you high above his head. You saw his extremely hairy pits on the way up and the smell smacked you in the nose. After holding you in the air and whistling for a couple bars, he threw you over the rope. You landed hard right in the middle of the ring on your tiny belly. The impact winded you and you balled up trying to catch your breath again. Because of the shock and fear, you didn’t even wonder why they wrestled in this type of ring rather than the traditional sumo mat. It’s probably better that you didn’t realize that the three evil sumo wrestlers enjoyed this ring more because they could torment their opponents more. They loved dropping off the corners onto their prey. Numerous bonzai drops intermingled with extended facesitting always got them horny.

All three monstrous men easily stepped over the top ropes and stood circling your prone body on the mat. Zuna looked at his tag team partners and asked, “Who wants to start the smelly discipline first?”
152321.title: To the Evil Wrestling Lair!

1523211.content: "You can go ahead first." Ozeki told Zuna. "Thank you." He said as he held you up with his lower two arms. He lifted up his up upper two arms. "Time to go to a pit stop!" Zuna said as he grabbed the back of your head and then stuffed it on his upper left armpit. Zuna scrubbed it slowly as he laughed. "One stop, three to go." Zuna said as he went to the lower left pit and rubbed your face in that as well. The others were smiling at your misfortune as he kept on going with the other two pits before finally putting you down. They circle around you once more. Who goes next?
1523211.title: Zuna - Pit Stop times 4

choices: The other two join in the fun
15232111.content:
You were nearly ready to pass out after having your face mashed into all four of Zuna's revolting armpits. Even though you were once again lying helpless on the ground in the middle of the wrestling mat, the noxious smell wouldn't go away. It took a lot of focus to try and keep from tossing your cookies. You looked up and begged the evil sumo wrestlers to show some mercy, but they continued circling like sharks around a hunk of meat.

Gonza reaches down and grabs you. He pulled you to your feet like a rag doll and then gave you a standing clothes line with his left arm. The metal arm felt like it nearly broke bones. Before you could fall down all the way, Zuna grabbed your pitiful body up and then whipped you into one of the corners. Your back smacked into the post, winding you. To your horror, you saw Gonza running at full speed toward you. His tall body made you feel insignificant and you were sure that the bulge in his white thong was due to him having fun tormenting you. You tried to get out of the way to safety, but he was just too fast. He barreled into you - his iron chest completely winding you this time. You slid down the corner, staring up at him as he turned around and walked to the side, laughing evilly.

You were hoping you would get a tiny break from this lopsided match, but that wasn't going to happen. Ozeki grabbed your feet and pulled you toward the center a little bit. Laying on your back looking up, you could see the corner post. He walked his bulky body over top of you. His scent was strong and super offensive. He started climbing up the ropes in the corner and you knew what was coming. You wanted to crawl away, but were still crippled from Gonza and Zuna. Ozeki's dark orange thong got higher and higher. You could see what you only hoped to be sweat stains in the massive crack. He was bald and the hugest of all these evil wrestlers. You knew that he used to have 3 ass cheeks and got rid of one from surgery, but you swear that his ass was still monstrous. Getting back a little energy, you go to roll out of the way. Unfortunately, he bellows out and drops down. His putrid ass covers your entire head and part of your chest. You can tell that he is laughing as he grinds his stinky thong covered asshole into your poor nose!

This is pure hell. You hope that it can't get any worse. Too bad for you - it does...
15232111.title: Ozeki Dominates You!

152321112.content:
Ozeki gets up and puts you into the middle of the ring where all three of them circle around you. You feel a bit dizzy because of what Ozeki did. Zuna and Gonzo sandwich their smelly, sweaty butts on you and start to grind on the stink. "How's that loser?" He asked you. You didn't answer because of the fact that their rancid smell was pummeling your nose.

What did they do next?
152321112.title: The other two join in the fun

1523212.content:
You were looking around like a crazed man trying to figure out how to get out of this dangerous situation. When Zuna asks the others who wanted to start first, you found yourself muttering, “Please not Ozeki, please not Ozeki, PLEASE NOT Ozeki!” Of course, your bad luck held out and Ozeki bellowed,

“I will start the discipline.” You were on the ground like a baby looking up at Ozeki. He towered over you and was clearly the fattest of the three. Gonzo was obviously taller, but Ozeki was massive – nearly as wide as he was tall. He turned around to taunt you with his ass that was attempting to rip out of his dark orange thong. You thought to yourself, “I knew he used to have 3 ass cheeks, but I thought he had the extra one removed. That thong looks massive and there is so much skin and flab bursting out the sides. Maybe he never had the surgery.”

Before you can do anything, he walks toward you and then jumps up in the air and flops his massive belly down on you. You feel crushed like a bug under his stinky, sweaty front side. For his size, he moves quickly. He gets up and runs to the corner. You try to get out of the way, but he jumps high in the air and then lands directly on top of you. Sitting comfortably on your head, he and his team mates laugh at your pitiful fate.

You are so close to either hurling or passing out. Ozeki's massive butt as squashing you. MMMPPPHHHMMRRRGGG. You try to beg for mercy, but the disgusting ass is smothering you. The vibrations from your screaming only excite your opponent and he starts grinding his ass harder on you. You are certain that...
1523212.title: Ozeki Starts the Discipline

choices: Zuna wants in on the action!
15232121.content:
Oh yuck, you are in a worse position than you ever thought possible. It was always known that Ozeki had been born with 3 butt cheeks, but it was common knowledge that he had one removed and was just left with two large ones. Obviously, that was a lie that was spread for one reason or other. With him sitting on top of your face, you could clearly feel 3 distinct cheeks. It was the weirdest thing ever. The third seems to be under the side two. All three circle his stinky butthole like petals to a very nasty flower.

Somehow, he has positioned you so that his hole is directly in front of your face. It is massive and the thin orange thong is doing nothing to keep the horrific smell from invading your helpless nostrils. All of the fat cheeks are smothering you and forcing you closer to his dirty smelling cave. His buddy's high five him as he grinds harder and harder. He enjoys the fact that he is easily dominating you. You are nearly to the point of passing out.

Too bad for you, he can tell by your lack of fighting back. He lifts up just a bit and semi-fresh air invigorates you. Next, he drops all of his weight directly on your head again and your nose actually pushes the orange fabric up into his butt. Zuna reaches down and lifts up your exposed feet. He has a bit of fun tickling them which makes you laugh uncontrollably - causing you to breath in more of Ozeki's noxious fumes.

Ozeki stands completely up - runs to the ropes - bounces off and jumps in the air again. His butt comes barreling back down on your poor abused face. He just laughs and bounces up and down. "Someone else want to punish this shrimp?"
15232121.title: Three Butt Cheeks?

15232122.content: He had the surgery. Ozeki's ass was just bigger then the others. The huge, fat, sweaty cheeks were on the sides of your face. He was grinding on you a lot, getting his sweaty funk on you. You thought that this was so gross. He got up and the three of them looked at you sexually laughing.
15232122.title: Ozeki Had the Surgery

152321222.content:
As the three of them was thinking of what to do with you next, they heard someone knock on the door. "Someone go get it." Zuna said. Gonzo got out of the ring and went to the door. Whoever it was, you hoped that they could help you escape this nasty place. Gonzo opened it and it was the Super Duper Sumos. What was the purpose of them being here?

Was it to get you back?

OR

To have a truce with them and all 6 of them torture you?
152321222.title: Someone comes in.

choices: The Super Duper Sumos spot you and battle against the Business Sumos
15233.content:
You fell on your ass on the beach after getting shot out of a cannon by Ms. Mister.

You look up to see three sumos dressed up in business suits training with their butts.

They looked at you and brought you to where they were.
15233.title: Nighttime "training" with the Business ...

152331.content:
These sumos are triplets, the main difference is the thongs that they wear. "My name is Bill (brown thong), these are my brothers Brad (yellow thong) and Blaine (purple thong). We're going to train you to beat those sumos!" Bill said as he held you down and almost sat on your face. "What are you doing? You ask him as you held your hands up to touch his massive butt. "Training! First things first, see how long you can hold me up." Bill said he squatted down more. You held it together until he let out a fart in your direction. After that, you let go and Bill sat down on your face. "How can you defeat the sumos if you can't stand a fart?" Bill said laughing while rubbing his massive butt in your face and farting twice. After that he got up. "Next up is push ups." Brad said.

You were okay with this, you did a couple of push ups before you felt something heavy on your back. "Just because I'm on your back, doesn't mean you can slack!" Brad said as you were struggling to do push ups with a huge man on your back. Your arms gave out and you fell on Ty sand. "Wow, you're weak!" Brad said before he grunted and farted on your back. "Finally is pull ups." Blaine said as Bill held your legs down. You did four pull ups before you saw a purple covered crotch in your face. "Booma and the others would do this to you know!" Blaine said. You kept on trying, but the sweaty smell of Blaine's crotch made you stop. "No more, please." You begged them. "Since you failed all three tasks, you have no right to complain!" Bill said as he punched you in the stomach, knocking you out. "Let's take him to our establishment." Blaine said they put on their suits and picked you up.

The Business Sumos took you to there Big Business Office and Gym. They went in the back and put you in a ring that looks very professional.
Blaine went and took out his cellphone. "Who are you about to call?" Brad asked Blaine. "The Evil Sumos, I mean, were all bad guys." Blaine responded. "True, but maybe we should keep the runt to ourselves." Brad retorted. "There is only one way to solve this: coin toss! Heads, we invite the Evil Sumos over. Tails, we keep him to ourselves deal?" Bill said. "Deal." Blaine and Brad said. Bill flipped Ty coin and it landed on...
152331.title: They introduce themselves to you!

choices: The Super Duper Sumos  Showed Up
1523311.content: "Heads, let's invite the evil sumos." Bill said as Blaine called the evil sumos to come over there. Five minutes later, The evil sumos showed up. "Wasn't that the guy that couldn't beat Booma?" Gonzo asked. "It sure is. We called you here so we can punish him together!" Brad said as he as giving you a noogie. "Alright then lets, do this!" Zuna said. Brad threw you back into the ring as all six sumos got into the ring. They were closing in on you, ready to torture every inch of your skinny body...
1523311.title: Heads (Six Bad Guys against You)

15233111.content:
"Oh, thank goodness your here!" You say as you scramble over to them. Booma looked down at you and smirked. He picked you up and thrusts his huge belly out, knocking you to the floor. "What are you guys doing?" You asked. "We are not here to help you at all!" Mamoo said. "Then what are you here for?" Bill asked.

Wat was the reason why The Super Duper Sumos came in there in the first place?

To issue a sumo-off to see which team keeps you or decide to join them in torturing you?
15233111.title: The Super Duper Sumos  Showed Up

152331112.content: "We want to join you in torturing this weak one." Mamoo said as he grabbed you and tossed you into the ring. "Really? Why should we trust you?" Bill asked. "Yeah, you beaten us before." Gonzo said. "Because all nine of us our powerful and he is not." Kimo said. Booma went into the ring and farted into your face. "Alright then, we'll all torture him together." Brad said. "Where should we torture him, in the ring right now or in the sauna and shower room?" Blaine asked the others. The nine sumos huddled up to make a decision. "It will be in..."
152331112.title: Nine Against One

choices: More Sumos Show Up To Join The Party
1523311122.content: "The Sauna and Shower Room!" All of the sumos said as Booma dragged you to that room. "We get to do a lot of things to you into there, including farting on you!" Booma said. "Shit on you!" Mamoo said. "Give you stinkfaces and bronco busters, regular and nude!" Kimo said as he let his hair down. "Give you unwanted lap dances!" Zuna said. "Blast our sperm on your face and rub it in with our butts and crotches!" Gonzo said. "Give you kisses, normal and shitty!" Ozeki said. "But most of all..." Bill said. "We all get to squash and smother you with our bodies!" The sumos said as they reached the room. They dragged you in and was about to close the door...
1523311122.title: The Sauna and Shower Room

15233111221.content:
"Can we come in to play?" A gruff sounding man asked. the sumos looked back and saw three more sumos. One was the Sumo Santa who came from the North Pole to be there. Next was Rikishi, a WWE Hall of Famer who still got it and finally was Booma's cousin... "Boomer!" Booma said as he went to hug his cousin. "It's been a long time since seeing you." Boomer said.

"Wait, is this city full of sumos?" You ask. "Yes!" They all say as they bring you into the Sauna and Shower Room.
15233111221.title: Super Sumo Party!

info.brief_description: You must wrestle the super duper sumo Booma in a stinkface wrestling match
info.description:
You have enlisted with bad inc and have agreed to have a stinkface wrestling match with the most powerful sumo, Booma (muscular sumo with blond hair and wears a blue thong). He is very proud of his gigantic butt and will always use it against you be it to fart on you, sit on you and squash you with his gluteus maximus where he does a butt drop on you from high in the air.

Please be imaginative;
Be descriptive of appearance and experienced senses;
Lots of facesitting and stinkfaces!!!

The main character is Booma, however Kimo and Mamoo can be included on later chapters and must also use the stinkface.
This is for enjoyment.
